wanted to update everyone on the the

because this has never happened before
actually as we were worshipping and

literally you know yah had reminded me a

for guardian angels dancing and joy with

saying worship with me let's worship

describe it was just it was beautiful
I'd never I'd never seen that before so
I was grateful for yah sort of opening
up at that vision to me as we were in

a subject that a lot of people don't
like to talk about but it's it's it
marks apostle shovels life and that is
the baptism of suffering a lot of times
we go through times or we don't
understand why why these dark times are
happening to us why do friends betray us
why are people acting the way they're
acting toward us why do we have to go to
the situation where it seems like it's
just like a year ago where I just got
cut off from my children and it was like
so painful and even now it's just all
the spiritual attacks I'm going through
you know even though all I'm trying to
do is you know set my face like tenderly
toward yon and I want this revival
but as we were looking in the scriptures
and particularly looking at all the
sufferings that like Joseph went through
when he was thrown into into the jail
under Pharaoh and then also the
sufferings that Paul shall went through
we're going to talk about how these
sufferings were finest these sufferings
bring us closer to Yahshua than we
otherwise would be so that not only can
we endure but we can also give to others
and we can reach out to others that we
otherwise wouldn't be able to reach out
to unless we've gone through these
sufferings so we really we talked about
that quite a bit and it was it was a
powerful time just using those
scriptures and discussing that so anyway
we are now meeting earlier every night
we're meeting not it not at seven
anymore but at six o'clock in the
evening 6 p.m. pacific time 9 p.m.
eastern we meet every single night for
prayer for bible study praise and

anyone is welcome to join we're meeting
